title: Any building / use by the Government / Semi-Government or Government Controlled bodies with basic FSI andvillage resettlement or resettlement of project affected person with full permissible FSI as that of residential zone
clause_text: Any building / use by the Government / Semi-Government or Government Controlled bodies with basic FSI andvillage resettlement or resettlement of project affected person with full permissible FSI as that of residential zone.
